reqs: Introduction to Global Geophysics: Pre-Reqs: EOSC 211, 250, and MATH 200, 215, 221; or by permission of instructor (e.g. equivalents for EOSC 211 and 250 will be allowed). Tues/Th classes - Time TBD (to work with schedules of students enrolled). If you would like to register for this course, please contact Alicia Warkentin at awarkentin@eos.ubc.ca.
description: Investigation of a topic to be agreed upon by a member of the faculty and the student. Permission of an undergraduate advisor and of the supervising faculty member is required before registration.
